sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1404166974 , "Enhance IOSF-SB Fabric Compiler (Dynamo) to Support SLES11": The main issue had to do with SLES11 using an older version of the convert utility in /usr/intel/bin, compared to SLES10; changed the call to the convert utility, to pick up the convert executable from the bin folder in the ImageMagick package, and added a Dynamo switch to optionally enable/disable the generation of a PDF graph for the SBR fabric.
2. 1503955035 , "CDC Synchronizer Custom not allow to include in cdc_setting file": Removed custom synchronizer directives from the CDC control files.
3. 1203389016 , "Update the PGCB subIP on the SBR, to integrate the DFX-related updates for PGCB 1.20": Updated the PGCB subIP to integrate DFX related changes for PGCB1.2.

Backend Updates:

General Updates:
Removed the "cdc custom synchronizer" directives in the ACECDC control files.

Validation Updates:

General Updates:
Test support for the RTL updates.

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

For support file an HSD at https://hsdes.intel.com/home/default.html#magazine?id=101846185&contentId=1012194360

The first endpoint release with support for parity pins is IOSF_Sideband_Endpoint_ALL_2014WW31_R1p0_v5.

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at https://zircon.fm.intel.com/zircon/zircon/zirconReleaseDashboardTable.p hp?top_filter_checkbox=0&Proj_id=12686&IP_id=17319&milestone_filter=4&Ver_id=all&App_id=all&showlatest=0
